entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:23 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or flurries. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to a few rain showers and ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:23 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
